MANUAL: Before starting, you can download the user manual.
BIENVENIDA1: The Parish Administration System (SINDEX) arises from the need to efficiently administer parish documents.
BIENVENIDA2: (SINDEX) seeks to provide the new technology tools to the different parishes so that in a practical way they can have access to accurate and timely information.
PORTADA: Register, search, transfer and print your documents.
PORTADA1: Sindex is software designed to unlimitedly store your documents. Allows registration, search and printing of Parish Records.
IMPORTANTE: Important! Only log in after you have registered.
PRECIOTITLE: Prices for the development, maintenance and security of your information.
PRECIOTITLE1: Sindex is a software developed for the registration and control of Parish documents, as well as allowing the transfer of documents between parishes.
CONTRIBUYA: Help update and maintain the app.
BENEFICIOS1: Buy a monthly plan and see its benefits at the following link.
BENEFICIOS2: Avoid monthly payments and get a significant discount for purchasing this plan.
REGISTREDETALLE: Unlimited storage of your documents classified by Books.
ALMACENAMIENTODETALLE: Your data will not be lost or damaged by third parties.
